Title: Riverwalk
Highlights: *Hop on or off at any of the bus tour’s 19 stops at your own leisure *Cruise down the San Antonio River Walk on a boat *Includes 4-D theater ride at the Tower of the Americas

Title: Haunted History Ghost Tour
Highlights: *Hear tales of haunting and paranormal activity in Texas *A costumed guide leads the way by lantern—for an extra scare factor *Convenient and easy-to-find meeting spot
